original_text: The father of the righteous shall greatly rejoice: and he that begetteth a wise child shall have joy of him.
korean_text: 의인의 아비는 크게 즐거울 것이요 지혜로운 자식을 낳은 자는 그로 말미암아 즐거울 것이니라

sentences.original_text: The father of the righteous shall greatly rejoice:
and he that begetteth a wise child
